title: Decorative Typography
content:
Hello

I’m researching decorative type for a restaurant identity. I’m looking for type where each character has been illustrated or integrates illustration.

The following are things along the right lines.

[http://www.grandpeople.org/home.html](http://web.archive.org/web/20081203205057/http:/www.grandpeople.org/home.html "http://www.grandpeople.org/home.html") \> Design \> Kaleidofon  
 [http://www.non-format.com/](http://web.archive.org/web/20081203205057/http:/www.non-format.com/ "http://www.non-format.com/")

I’d be greatful if anybody could point me in the direction. Whether its an existing identity/style of an actual font.

Cheers

 [‹ Seeking Resources for Page-Spread Design](http://web.archive.org/web/20081203205057/http:/www.typophile.com/node/40359 "Go to previous forum topic") [Book about the Design of Posters ›](http://web.archive.org/web/20081203205057/http:/www.typophile.com/node/41144 "Go to next forum topic")
author: marc
